data.persona: I am a threat to someone's wife and family.  I usually get linked to married men.  I am said to be a home breaker.
data.description:
You are in the the fountain.
the fountain is the only thing you can hear in the graveyard. It's eerily quiet, not even a bird chirping. The fountain is teen feet high, and it is dry as a desert. It makes the graveyard more eerie than any other one.
There's a The fountain, a grass, a fountain, and a weed here.
The archer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hurt the archer
data.mid_motivation: I plan to break up with the archer today
data.long_motivation: I hope to become the mistress of the king in the coming weeks
